details: The air conditioning (A/C) unit in room 105 is malfunctioning and making a loud noise. This needs maintenance attention.
The digital key system failed to work properly on multiple occasions during my stay in room 220.
Fire safety equipment in the ballroom is due for an inspection. Schedule a follow-up with the fire safety company.
Elevator on the north side of the building is making unusual noises. Request inspection and maintenance.
Room 305 had a persistent odor. Housekeeping needs to perform a deep clean.
Reported issue with Wi-Fi connectivity in meeting room 2. IT department needs to check the network setup.
The EV charging station was not functioning properly. Several guests reported issues charging their vehicles.
One of the fire exits near room 415 was partially blocked. Ensure all fire exits are clear and accessible.
Leak detected in the ceiling of room 202. Maintenance needs to investigate and repair.
Complaints of noise from construction nearby affecting rooms on the south side of the building.
Inspection of non-smoking policy compliance in rooms 301-320. Found no issues; all rooms are compliant.
The coffee machine in the breakfast area is malfunctioning. Needs repair or replacement.
Housekeeping reported that the TV in room 312 is not working. Needs to be checked and possibly replaced.
Guest in room 503 reported that the shower has low water pressure.
Routine inspection of the pool area revealed some tiles are loose and need repair.
Reported issue with the thermostat in room 210. Maintenance needs to check the HVAC system.
Guest in room 115 complained about noise from the street. Consider soundproofing options.
Health and safety inspection found that the gym equipment needs servicing. Schedule maintenance.
The card reader at the main entrance is malfunctioning. Needs urgent repair to ensure security.
Guest in room 401 reported that the mini-fridge is not cooling properly.
Fire alarm system test scheduled. Ensure all alarms are functional and up to code.
Reported leak in the basement storage area. Needs immediate attention to prevent damage.
Guest in room 521 mentioned that the window lock is broken. Needs to be fixed for safety.
Elevator safety inspection completed. All elevators passed without issues.
The digital key system in room 105 is malfunctioning. Needs urgent repair.
Guest in room 220 reported that the air conditioning is not cooling properly.
Routine inspection found that the fire extinguishers in ballroom 1 need to be recharged.
The projector in meeting room 3 is not working. Needs replacement before the next conference.
Guest in room 315 complained about a persistent odor. Housekeeping needs to perform a deep clean.
The EV charging station was reported to be malfunctioning. Needs immediate inspection and repair.
Health inspection found that the kitchen in the business center needs a thorough cleaning.
The coffee machine in the lobby is broken. Needs to be fixed or replaced.
Guest in room 420 reported that the TV is not functioning. Needs to be checked and possibly replaced.
Routine safety inspection found that the emergency exit signs in the north wing are not properly illuminated.
The elevator near the east wing is making unusual noises. Needs to be inspected by maintenance.
Guest in room 501 reported that the mini-fridge is not cooling properly.
Leak detected in the ceiling of room 205. Maintenance needs to investigate and repair.
Guest in room 305 reported that the shower has low water pressure.
Inspection of the fire alarm system in ballroom 2. Found no issues; all alarms are functional.
Reported issue with the thermostat in room 110. Maintenance needs to check the HVAC system.
Guest in room 415 complained about noise from the hallway. Consider installing soundproofing measures.
Routine inspection found that the gym equipment needs servicing. Schedule maintenance.
The card reader at the main entrance is malfunctioning. Needs urgent repair to ensure security.
Guest in room 501 reported that the room was not cleaned properly upon check-in.
Health inspection found that the pool water chemistry is out of balance. Needs immediate correction.
The ice machine on the second floor is not working. Needs repair or replacement.
Guest in room 320 reported that the bed linens were stained. Housekeeping needs to provide fresh linens.
Elevator safety inspection completed. All elevators passed without issues.
